column1: I am deeply honored to announce that Erie County Sheriff Tim Howard has endorsed me for Congress. He has been strong supporter of conservative values and the Second Amendment and together we are ready to make sure NY27 has strong conservative representation in Congress! https://t.co/TnujP8ERla
